ValidationRule.description:
For Classic and LEX Console Cases
Used in CEI rollout.
Once a case has been closed the status cannot change.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW() = false, OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status ),"Closed"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status ),"Merged")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Merged")), NOT($User.ProfileId = "00e70000000swa5"), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Console_Case", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Cost_Maintenance", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Equipment_Parts_and_Service", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Console_CS_Lightning", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Tax_Operations"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This case has already been Closed or Merged. You may not re-open this case.
